Translations.Text: Say, “Praise is due only for God, and peace on His servants whom He has chosen. Is God better or that which they associate as partners (with Him)

Who is it, Who has created the skies and the earth and sent down for you water from the sky? Then We cause to grow through it, beautiful gardens, it is not (possible) for you to cause the trees to grow therein. Is there a god with God? No, they are a people who equate (others with God)

Who is it, Who has made the earth a place for staying, and made rivers in the passages therein, and made mountains on it, and made a barrier between the two seas? Is there a god with God? No, the majority of them does not know
Who is it, Who responds to the distressed when he prays to Him and removes the evil and makes you successors of the earth? Is there a god with God? Little is it that you mind

Who is it, Who guides you in the darkness of the land and the sea, and Who sends the winds as good news before His mercy? Is there a god with God? Highly Exalted is God above that which they associate as partners (with Him)
Who is it, Who begins the creation then gets it reproduced, and Who provides you from the sky and the earth? Is there a god with God? Say, “Bring your proof if you are truthful.”
Say, “No one in the skies and the earth knows the unseen except God, and they do not perceive when they will be raised.”
No, their knowledge has reached (its limit with regard to its penetration) into the hereafter, no, they are in a doubt regarding it, no, they are blind regarding it. (R)
